ROW.DATDSC: SELECT '' CHECK_XZ, A.YY, A.MM, A.DD, A.CWPCH, B.PZH PZH, A.ZY, DECODE(A.JEFX, '借', A.JE, 0) JFJE, DECODE(A.JEFX, '借', 0, A.JE) DFJE, decode(a.QCBZ,1,a.YEFX,'借') YEFX, A.YE, A.SISEQNO, A.DJH, A.YWPCH, A.ZTLX, A.ZTBH, A.ZTMC, A.KMBH, A.CZYXM, A.JSFS, A.DYYWJK_LX, A.YSZL_YHRZLSH, A.YSZL_YHRZRQ, A.YSZL_YHRZSJ, A.YSZL_YSCBDXSXF, A.YSZL_YSSBJGSXF, A.YSZL_YHZL, d.name, A.YSZL_SZBZ, A.YSZL_FKF_KHYH, A.YSZL_FKF_YHZH, A.YSZL_FKF_YHHM, A.YSZL_SKF_KHYH, A.YSZL_SKF_YHZH, A.YSZL_SKF_YHHM, A.FILENAME, A.YSZL_YHCZLSH, A.YSZL_YHCZJBR, A.YSZL_YHCZSJ, A.CZYSJ, '' bz, A.SXH, A.QCBZ,A.JEFX,c.mkjmbz,a.yszl_dzbz FROM CW_YHRJZB A,CW_PZB B,( select distinct sbh,zth,siseqno,nvl(mkjmbz,'nul') mkjmbz,fkbz from cw_rjzb where sbh='[%SBH]' and zth='[%ZTH]' and yy='[%YYYY]' and mm='[%MM]' AND KMBH = '[%KMBH]') c,SI_SBYW_CONFIG d WHERE A.SBH = '[%SBH]' AND A.ZTH = '[%ZTH]' AND A.YY = '[%YYYY]' AND A.MM = '[%MM]' AND A.KMBH = '[%KMBH]' AND A.SBH = B.SBH(+) AND A.ZTH = B.ZTH(+) AND A.PZH = B.CZXH(+) and a.sbh=c.sbh(+) and a.zth=c.zth(+) and a.siseqno=c.siseqno(+) and a.yszl_ywlx = d.id(+) --and nvl(c.mkjmbz,'nul')!='3' /*模块标志是未分款的不显示*/ and not (nvl(c.mkjmbz,'nul')='3' and nvl(c.fkbz,'0')<>'3') /*AND A.QCBZ = 0*/ [%FILTER] ORDER BY A.DD, A.SXH, A.SISEQNO

SELECT A.YY, A.MM, A.DD, B.PZH || A.STR_PZH STR_PZH, A.ZY, DECODE(A.JEFX, '借', A.JE, null) JFJE, DECODE(A.JEFX, '借', null, A.JE) DFJE, A.SISEQNO, A.LSH, A.DYLSH, A.DJH, A.OLD_PCH, A.DWBH, A.DWMC, A.KMBH, A.CZYXM, A.CZYSJ, A.ZYRYMD, A.JEFX FROM CW_RJZB A,CW_PZB B WHERE A.SBH = '[%SBH]' AND A.ZTH = '[%ZTH]' AND A.YY = '[%YYYY]' AND A.MM = '[%MM]' AND A.KMBH = '[%KMBH]' AND A.SISEQNO = '[%SISEQNO]' AND A.SBH = B.SBH(+) AND A.ZTH = B.ZTH(+) AND A.PZH = B.CZXH(+) ORDER BY A.DD,A.SXH,A.LSH

SELECT NVL(C.RJLX, A.KMBH) RJLX, NVL(B.KXMC, D.KMMC) KXMC, A.YM1, A.YM2, A.JEFX, A.JE, A.SBH, A.ZTH, A.LSH, C.LXBH, B.MXXH FROM CW_RJZMXB A, CW_RJLXMXB B, CW_RJLXB C, CW_KMB D WHERE A.ORG = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND A.ACC = '[%SYS_ACCID]' AND A.LSH = '[%LSH]' AND D.ORG(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND D.ACC(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' AND D.KMBH(+) = A.KMBH AND D.SBH(+) = A.SBH AND D.ZTH(+) = A.ZTH AND B.ORG(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND B.ACC(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' AND B.LXBH(+) = A.LXBH AND B.MXXH(+) = A.LXXH AND B.SBH(+) = A.SBH AND B.ZTH(+) = A.ZTH AND C.ORG(+) = '[%SYS_ORGID]' AND C.ACC(+) = '[%SYS_ACCID]' AND C.LXBH(+) = A.LXBH AND C.SBH(+) = A.SBH AND C.ZTH(+) = A.ZTH ORDER BY A.MXXH, A.LXBH, A.LXXH

SELECT A.LSH, A.DYLSH, A.YY, A.MM, A.DD, A.KMBH, A.PCH, A.JSFS, A.DWBH, A.DWMC, C.DWLXBH, A.JE, A.JEFX, B.YM1, B.YM2, A.ZY, A.ZYRYMD FROM CW_RJZB A, CW_RJZMXB B, SI_DWB C WHERE A.SBH = B.SBH AND A.ZTH = B.ZTH AND A.LSH = B.LSH AND A.SBH = C.SBH(+) AND A.ZTH = C.ZTH(+) AND A.DWBH = C.DWBH(+) AND A.SISEQNO = '[%SBLSH]' AND A.SBH = '[%SBH]' AND A.ZTH = '[%ZTH]' AND A.KMBH = '[%KMBH]' AND ROWNUM = 1
